pr_title: Mappings and Explanatory Javadoc for Chunk Update Changes

timeline.message: Mappings for changes to chunk update packets

timeline.bodyText: retainOldLighting?
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: unpack(To)LocalX, so on
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos
 	METHOD method_22446 stream (Lnet/minecraft/class_1923;I)Ljava/util/stream/Stream;
 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius
+	METHOD method_30551 getPackedLocalPosX (S)I

replies.bodyText:
That would be inconsistent with the other methods, although I also like that more :-|
Also, "getPacked..." should be "packLocalPos", would you also favor that change together with renaming all of these to "unpack..."?
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: Oh and also inconsistent with the functions to pack/unpack the position of chunk positions themselves.
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: Yeah getPacked is accessing a packed value. However there is no packed value to access here: the packed value is rather passed by the method caller and the unpacked value is returned. Hence unpack than getPacked, and other getPacked methods need fixing as well If they are unpacking a value than accessing a packed value.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
No, what I mean the other method is actually doing the packing :-D
But I take that as a yes.
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: On second thought, I looked through the methods again and I'd rather leave them as is. The class has a shitton of methods dealing with various different coordinate systems, and I think being verbose here - while tedious - avoids mistakes.
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: So this method actually does packing? Are you kidding me, packing a short into an integer?
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
No, but the alternative is: getXFromPackedLocalPos.
Regarding pack/unpack: It's not consistent with any of the other methods in this class that do packing.
I.e. asLong...
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: Okay, I refactored more members in this class and added alot more docs. Is this better?
replies.author: shartte

timeline.bodyText: unpack(To)WorldX, so on
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos
 	METHOD method_22446 stream (Lnet/minecraft/class_1923;I)Ljava/util/stream/Stream;
 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius
+	METHOD method_30551 getPackedLocalPosX (S)I
+		COMMENT Gets the local x-coordinate from the given packed local position.
+		COMMENT @see #getPackedLocalPos
+		ARG 0 packedLocalPos
+	METHOD method_30552 getPackedLocalPosY (S)I
+		COMMENT Gets the local y-coordinate from the given packed local position.
+		COMMENT @see #getPackedLocalPos
+		ARG 0 packedLocalPos
+	METHOD method_30553 getPackedLocalPosZ (S)I
+		COMMENT Gets the local z-coordinate from the given packed local position.
+		COMMENT @see #getPackedLocalPos
+		ARG 0 packedLocalPos
+	METHOD method_30554 getPackedLocalPosBlockX (S)I

replies.bodyText: See my comment above. I'd rather keep these verbose names.
replies.author: shartte
